casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Henry Ford ADKINS. No. 55P02-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2005. Henry Ford Adkins, Pro Se. Christopher W. Brooks, Assistant Attorney General, Belinda J. Foster, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 1st day of February 2005 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Rockingham County:

"Denied by order of the Court in Conference this the 3rd day of March 2005."
